snippet: Childhood traumas are more common among military members and veterans than among civilians, according to a new study. Researchers say the results support the notion that for some, enlistment serves as an escape from troubled upbringings....

headline.print_headline: Childhood Traumas More Common in Military Members
headline.main: Childhood Traumas More Common in Military Members

lead_paragraph: Childhood traumas are more common among military members and veterans than among civilians, according to a new study. Researchers say the results support the notion that for some, enlistment serves as an escape from troubled upbringings.
